topic: How to combine selectors with typing for production code (Python 3.12+)
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to combine selectors with typing for production code (Python 3.12+)
response_raw:
{
  "title": "Combining Selectors and Typing in Python 3.12+ for Production Code",
  "summary": "This explainer demonstrates how to leverage the power of type hints from Python's Type Hints (typing) module, along with CSS-like selectors (selenium.webdriver.common.by), in a production-ready manner in Python 3.12+.",
  "key_points": [
    "Use type hinting to improve code readability and reduce potential runtime errors.",
    "Utilize the 'By' class from Selenium to create CSS selectors for web elements.",
    "Combine the benefits of both typing and By, ensuring that the correct elements are selected with robust type hinting.",
    "Ensure your Python environment is using 3.12 or later for optimal results."
  ],
  "code_examples": [
    {
      "language": "python",
      "code": "from typing import TypeVar, List, Optional\n\n" +
              "T = TypeVar('T')\n\n" +
              "def find_elements(driver: webdriver.Remote, by: By, value: str) -> List[WebElement]:\n" +
              "    return driver.find_elements(*(by, value))\n\n" +
              "def get_element(driver: webdriver.Remote, by: By, value: str, expected_count: int = 1) -> Optional[WebElement]:\n" +
              "    elements = find_elements(driver, by, value)\n" +
              "    if len(elements) == expected_count:\n" +
              "        return elements[0]\n" +
              "    else:\n" +
              "        raise ElementNotInteractableException('Expected one element but found {}.'.format(len(elements)))"
    }
  ],
  "version_notes": [
    "This code is designed for Python 3.12+, and will not work on earlier versions."
  ],
  "caveats": [
    "Ensure you have Selenium WebDriver installed in your Python environment to run this example.",
    "Don't forget to import required modules at the beginning of your script:"
      + "\nfrom typing import TypeVar, List, Optional\n"
      + "\nfrom selenium.webdriver.common.by import By\n"
      + "\nfrom selenium.webdriver.remote.webdriver import WebDriver"
  ]
}
